pkgmetadata.longdescription: bounced=======A library to determine info on bounced email messages.Why another one?----------------With `flufl.bounce`_ one only gets a list of email addresses without any further info.The API of `bounce_email`_ isn't Pythonic and inefficient for several use cases, like when you already have email message objects... _flufl.bounce: https://pypi.org/project/flufl.bounce/.. _bounce_email: https://pypi.org/project/bounce_email/References----------http://www.serversmtp.com/en/smtp-errorChangelog=========0.2.0 - 2018-03-31------------------* Support ``local`` recipient kind. [fschulze]* Support longer status codes like ``5.1.10``. [fschulze]0.1.0 - 2018-03-30------------------* Initial release. [fschulze]
